name: Escape The Robots And Oh Gosh They're Coming Run 2: The Better One
name_original: Escape The Robots And Oh Gosh They're Coming Run 2: The Better One
description:
Try to get escape from a planet full of robots that want to make you dead.

Please Note:

  • This is pre-alpha software! Expect bugs!
  • This game is meant to replace the original game, NOT to build on its storyline.
  • Every bit of the original game's mechanics have been replaced.

This project is open source!

You can view the code on GitHub, and use it to make improvements, mods, or even use code in your own game!
